title: OPENING A HEXTECH CHEST U WORK HARD FOR AND GETTING A CHAMPION SHARD !!!!!
body: This is so dumb i have open 3 chests in the last 3 weeks!! And guess what I got! 3 champion shard in a row!!! Are u kidding me why would someone want a champion shard from a chest!!!!!! every week i wait so i can get a free skin next min a champion shard. Its like u work hard to get the S for the chest and 3 keys to only receive and shttty champion shard!!It really turns me away from the game.

replies.body: Also I need more blue essence to level up mastery.

Even if you do get skins, it doesn't mean you'll get to use them anyway since we all have our corner of champions who we simply don't use at all.

As such, I don't see that much of a difference between getting a champ or a skin shard, they are both cool. In fact, getting a skin shard might be even bigger of a bummer if the said skin is either dirt cheap and/or badly designed, or is for a champion you never touch; meanwhile having more champions is never really a bad idea assuming you aren't an ARAM spammer or that the champion you got is within 450 or 1350 IP tier.

So in the end of the day, it all depends on the perspectives.
